items.sentence: I am altering the christmas decorations.
I am cultivating an idea to take over the world!
I enjoy debating about what is the best football team.
My confidence in winning our fantasy football league is eroding.
I am harvesting fruits before the holidays.
Your volume is impacting my concentration.
Some people really enjoy mingling at parties.
Mom is overtaking Ashwin in fantasy football.
Ashwin is plunging in fantasy football brackets.
Josh Allen is producing more points when he's not on Ashwin's team.
Ashwin's points are slowly reducing when another player plays.
The defeat is scarring Ashwin's ego.
Saint Brown is supplying all the points, but Mom is not playing him.
The dew point fell before the storm.
Do you want to trade Josh Allen for Saquon Barkley?
Your assignment, that is in your backpack, is due tomorrow.
